src:
Diduga Kencani Teman Lama, Keanu Reeves Umbar Senyum
05 Nov 2019, 09:52 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Kemunculan Keanu Reeves bersama seorang wanita pada Senin (4/11) waktu setempat membuat publik terkejut. (Foto: Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images/AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Aktor Keanu Reeves tak lagi muram dan suram. Sekalipun masih gemar mengenakan pakaian warna hitam-hitam, ia kini mengumbar senyum sembari menggandeng tangan seorang wanita, seperti di acara LACMA Art + Film di Los Angeles baru-baru ini.Wanita tersebut dikenal sebagai Alexandra Grant, seorang seniman.Baik Keanu Reeves maupun Grant sendiri tidak berkomentar apapun saat berpose di karpet merah, berdua tanpa melepaskan genggaman tangan masing-masing. Publik segera berspekulasi ada sesuatu yang istimewa di antara mereka.Sebelum tampil di karpet merah, Reeves dan Grant disebut People pernah terlihat makan malam bersama di sebuah tempat mewah di Santa Monica. Mereka sampai dengan menumpangi mobil Porsche milik Reeves sebelum melenggang masuk ke restoran dan menikmati waktu setidaknya tiga jam di sana.


Alexandra Grant dan Keanu Reeves di Los Angeles, Senin (4/11) waktu setempat. (Emma McIntyre/Getty Images for LACMA/AFP)

Reeves dan Grant telah saling mengenal sejak lama. Keduanya bekerja sama untuk pertama kali saat Grant mengerjakan ilustrasi untuk buku Reeves yang berjudul Ode to Happiness pada 2011. Lima tahun kemudian, pasangan ini kembali bersama untuk buku kedua Reeves, Shadows. Pada 2017 mereka sepakat mendirikan perusahaan penerbit X Artists' Books, keputusan yang membuat Reeves dan Grant beberapa kali menjalani wawancara bersama."Beberapa orang ada pemimpi yang punya banyak sekali ide tetapi tidak menyelesaikan apa yang mereka mulai. Saya rasa kami berdua sama-sama senang punya ide dan mewujudkannya ke dunia," kata Grant dalam salah satu kesempatan pada 2018 lalu.Jika benar Keanu Reeves mengencani Alexandra Grant, maka wanita tersebut mengisi kesendirian hidup sang aktor John Wick setelah putus dari model China Chow pada 2008 lalu.Tahun ini menjadi tahun besar bagi Reeves, yang memiliki beberapa film sekaligus. Ia berperan di John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum, Toy Story 4, dan Always Be My Maybe yang tayang di Netflix. Hingga beberapa bulan lalu, ia bahkan mendapat julukan 'internet's boyfriend'. (rea)
text:
Allegedly Dating an Old Friend, Keanu Reeves Umbar Smile
05 Nov 2019, 09:52 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The appearance of Keanu Reeves with a woman on Monday (4/11) local time surprised the public. (Photo: Matt Winkelmeyer / Getty Images / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actor Keanu Reeves is no longer gloomy and gloomy. Even though he still likes to wear black clothes, he now makes a smile while holding a woman's hand, as in the LACMA Art + Film show in Los Angeles recently. The woman is known as Alexandra Grant, an artist. Both Keanu Reeves and Grant himself did not comment anything when posing on the red carpet, both without releasing the grip of each other's hands. The public immediately speculated there was something special between them. Before appearing on the red carpet, Reeves and Grant called People had been seen having dinner together at a fancy place in Santa Monica. They arrived in Reeves' Porsche before strolling into the restaurant and enjoying at least three hours there.


Alexandra Grant and Keanu Reeves in Los Angeles, Monday (4/11) local time. (Emma McIntyre / Getty Images for LACMA / AFP)

Reeves and Grant have known each other for a long time. The two worked together for the first time when Grant worked on illustrations for Reeves's book, Ode to Happiness in 2011. Five years later, the couple returned together for Reeves's second book, Shadows. In 2017 they agreed to establish the publishing company X Artists' Books, a decision that made Reeves and Grant go through several interviews together. "Some people are dreamers who have lots of ideas but don't finish what they started. I think we are both happy have an idea and make it happen to the world, "Grant said on one occasion in 2018. If it's true Keanu Reeves is dating Alexandra Grant, then the woman fills the loneliness of the actor John Wick's life after breaking up with the Chinese Chow model in 2008. This year is the year great for Reeves, who has several films at once. He played in John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum, Toy Story 4, and Always Be My Maybe that aired on Netflix. Until a few months ago, he even got the nickname 'internet's boyfriend'. (rea)
